function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of compliance with stay at home and social distancing measures","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19, higher infection rates, and overwhelmed healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Clear communication, enforcement of sanctions, reminders, and moral appeals","Technologies":"None provided","People":"General public","Owner":"Government authorities, local leaders"},{"Description":"Use of moral appeals for compliance","Impact":"Reliance on personal ethics for adherence, potential resistance, and varied responses to appeals","Mitigation":"Clear communication, consistent messaging, and targeted appeals to different demographic groups","Technologies":"None provided","People":"General public","Owner":"Government authorities, local leaders"},{"Description":"Enforcement of sanctions for non-compliance","Impact":"Potential resistance, distrust of authorities, and unequal application of sanctions","Mitigation":"Transparent guidelines, fair application of sanctions, and clear communication of consequences","Technologies":"Increased law enforcement patrol","People":"General public","Owner":"Government authorities, law enforcement"}]}
